explanations.machine learning: The paper compares the suggested model with four standard machine learning models, indicating relevance to machine learning.
explanations.reinforcement learning: The paper proposes a deep reinforcement learning model and compares it with two state-of-the-art reinforcement learning models.
explanations.deep learning: The paper suggests a model that incorporates deep learning methods, specifically mentioning stacked sparse denoising autoencoder (SSDAE) and LSTM-based autoencoder (LSTM-AE).
explanations.representation learning: The paper addresses the difficulty of representation in quantitative portfolio management, which is a core aspect of representation learning.
explanations.neural network: The proposed model uses deep learning networks, which are a type of neural network.
explanations.long short-term memory: The paper mentions the use of a long-short-term-memory-based autoencoder (LSTM-AE) in the model.
explanations.LSTM: Abbreviation for long short-term memory, used in the LSTM-AE component of the model.
explanations.autoencoder: The model incorporates a stacked sparse denoising autoencoder (SSDAE) and an LSTM-based autoencoder (LSTM-AE).
explanations.denoising autoencoder: The model uses a stacked sparse denoising autoencoder (SSDAE) as part of its architecture.
